name: Sacrifices (CinemaLeo)
description:
Completed for Blackthornprod's Game Jam #3 (2021), this is my first ever project... And there was certainly a lot to learn. Because of this I decided to focus on learning how to complete a project, using assets found on the asset store [listed below].

Through programming (using Bolt), designing the terrain, building the dialogue system (through Bolt), laying out the level and reaching the (somewhat dubious) finish line I have learnt a great deal. And, thankfully, that's exactly what I came into this Jam hoping for.

I hope the game can be a calm breath of fresh air.

Details

Unfortunately, due being totally new, I failed to optomise the game for WebGL or Mac, as such it's only on Windows--at least for now.

Please do let me know if you encounter any bugs.

Assets Models & Textures

Low Poly Animated Animals by PolyPerfect https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/low-poly-animated-an...

Krabs the Crab by Polydactyl https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/krabs-the-crab-quirk...

Low Poly Survival Game Props by Timothy Porter

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-survival-game-props-107984

Low Poly Mini Village Free by Ioan Stan

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-mini-village-free...
